nodes.bodyText: I think here you can use something like KafkaConnect.RESOURCE_KIND etc.
Wouldn't it be better to decide that in logCurrentStatus ?
waitForResourceStatus is better name from my POV
Why did you rename it? Now it's not consistent with other resources
This was some error, I didn't wanted to rename it, thanks for the comment
Do we really need it? I think CO do this check as well, or maybe we should check it when KafkaUser is rdy
Same as above
Indent. Are you sure it will take proper condition? In Kafka case for example.
I tried whole KafkaST (I know we tried to fix the problem when WARNING appear to condition) and it should work. I will take a deeper look at it and let you know if it will cause any future problems.
same as above

Again, use ResourceManager.logCurrentStatus instead.
Maybe we should use different name? Or log it directly in that function? Now it's a little bit confusing
I think we can add it directly to log function, I think that we will never use without second method.
I'm guessing the {} are something you copy and pasted from some logging stmt? It might be worth using String.format() rather than so much concat.
printWholeCR? :)
